name: astro-plugins
description: Various astro plugins such as astro-htmlnano to minify Astro files with HTMLNano and CSSNano
author: Amin Yahyaabadi

scripts.bump: pnpm exec ncu -u && pnpm -r exec ncu -u && typesync --ignoredeps=dev && pnpm update
scripts.doc: shx rm -rf packages/*/README.md && pnpm -r exec readme --path ../../dev/readme/template.md -y && pnpm -r exec ts-readme
scripts.test: run-p test.cspell test.lint && run-s test.posthtml test.htmlnano
scripts.test.htmlnano: run-s clean build && cd test && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TEST=htmlnano pnpm build
scripts.test.posthtml: run-s clean build && cd test && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TEST=posthtml pnpm build
